i work at a animal clinic.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Not much, just got home from work. I'm a vet tech, so my day is pretty busy.
That's awesome! I love animals. I just bought a new house with my partner, and we have two dogs and a cat.
That's so cute! I have a dog and a cat too. What kind of dogs do you have?
A golden retriever and a husky. They're both really sweet.
I love huskies! They're so fluffy.
Yeah, they are. They're also really energetic.
I know what you mean. My husky is always running around.
My golden retriever is a little calmer, but he's still pretty playful.
That's good. I like when dogs have a good balance of energy and calmness.
Me too. It makes them more fun to have around.
Yeah, I agree.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to paint, go to the movies, and play video games.
I love to paint too! What kind of things do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and portraits.
That's awesome! I like to paint abstracts.
That's cool. I've never tried painting abstracts before.
It's fun! You should try it sometime.
I might just do that.
Cool! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks
